# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it by emailing [INSERT-SECURITY-CONTACT] with details.

- Do not file public issues for security problems.
- We will coordinate a fix and disclose responsibly.

## Supported Versions
- Only the latest stable release is supported with security updates.

## Disclosure Policy
- All vulnerabilities are reviewed promptly.
- The issue will be closed when a patch is released and coordinated disclosure is made.
